body_html: There is no trick. We envisioned the exercise to be difficult because a user would need to invoke several tiling, reshape and matmul operations. Most of the challenge would be in the construction of the tiling operation across the local3 and local4.
body_text: There is no trick. We envisioned the exercise to be difficult because a user would need to invoke several tiling, reshape and matmul operations. Most of the challenge would be in the construction of the tiling operation across the local3 and local4.
body: There is no trick. We envisioned the exercise to be difficult because a user would need to invoke several tiling, reshape and matmul operations. Most of the challenge would be in the construction of the tiling operation across the local3 and local4.
